Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Em-Pis1M (E. malabaricus piscidine 1, natural AMPs; fish, animals; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 76.9% similarity tofish Epinecidin-1. Mol Wt:  2985.646; GRAVY: 0.236.Activity:Active against E. coli (MIC 2.5 uM), S. aureus (MIC 1.25 uM), and V. parahaemolyticus (MIC 1.25 uM). MBC values are the same same MICs.Structure: Both a short form and a longer form are helical, implying Em-Pis1M (mature form) is also helical. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Li ZP, Chen DW, Pan YQ, Deng L.2016
Literature Information.Title: Two isoforms of piscidin from Malabar grouper, Epinephelus malabaricus: Expression and functional characterization.
